message.body: Hey it's Noah, just confirming 6:45 at Jose pistolas tonight. See you there
Looking forward to it!
In the back. Green shirt
Just got here.
I'm starting work on the prop list and budget right now, you mentioned $1000 for all 3 videos. Is my pay a separate piece or is it included in there?
It is included. But the requirements taper with each episode.
Gotcha
Budget sent, let me know what you think
Budget looks good. $600 is fair for your work. What is the best way to get you a down payment and the $400 for props costumes etc?
Cool. Cash or check works
Are you able to meet up today?
Cash. I can meet you in centr city at 3
Sounds good, where do you want to meet?
Elixir coffee shop 15th street at 330.
Looking for parking, be there in a few
K. I can't be he for too long tho. Heading into work.
It looks like I dont have to rush ship the hourglass. It only appears interior bathroom
The bathing suit top would prob be seen under the robe in the chest area. We'll need it for the first shoot
Ah your right. I'll order accordingly
Yup
But the bathroom is at the Powell house.
I'd like to have the bathing suit shipped directly to woody's house since its getting altered there. Do you have his address?
Are you good to order everything? Any questions?
Yup, I put in the orders past night
*last night
What size t shirt does the roommate need?
Ok. You guys have any shirt printing hook ups or should I just try a south Philly place?
Get a small and med
Or I could prob just do it myself with iron on letters
Did you mention one of the shoots needing a bell? There's an awesome old cast iron one at a thrift store. Lemmie know if I should grab it
Grab it.
Ok
